devdoc.author: Nima Kamoosi
devdoc.details: The contained state includes the contract owner, ETH deposit balance the issued currency balance, the currency balance, price feed allocations, last date of fee payments and any pending liquidation requests.

constructor.details: creats the loan instnace, sets its owner, and assigns the main system contract instance

params._owner: is owner of the loan and is set at time of creation

devdoc.title: Loan contract of the \{\{PegLoan\}\} currency peg system

userdoc.notice: The Loan contract holds the state of a given loan, as part of the \{\{PegLoan\}\} currency peg system. It works alongside the System, PriceFeed, and PeggedCurrency contracts to make the whole system function.
